title: Oklahoma City's Shai Gilgeous-Alexander
description:
Oklahoma City Thunder guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander joins The Woj Pod to discuss lessons learned under Chris Paul, his rookie indoctrination into the NBA with the Clippers and Patrick Beverley, Canadian basketball, the AAU tournament feel of The Bubble and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
